thread.title: Release dates for 'The Incredibles 2' and 'Toy Story 4'
thread.title_full: Release dates for 'The Incredibles 2' and 'Toy Story 4'

title: Release dates for 'The Incredibles 2' and 'Toy Story 4'
text:
CNN Leadership
You will have to wait for 'The Incredibles 2' and 'Toy Story 4' Updated 1845 GMT (0145 HKT) October 9, 2015 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film Fans will have to wait till June 2019 for "The Incredibles 2," with "Cars 3" coming in June 2017 and "Toy Story 4" in June 2018. Check out some other sequels moviegoers are anxiously awaiting: Hide Caption 1 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film Sam Smith singing the theme song for "Spectre" is just one of the things to get excited about in the latest James Bond installment. Daniel Craig returns as 007, and Lea Seydoux is the femme fatale. Hide Caption 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film The Force will "Awaken" on December 18 as "Star Wars: Episode VII" bows in theaters. Hide Caption 3 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film The comedy of Ice Cube, left, and Kevin Hart is a beautiful thing to watch, and we'll get a second dose of their buddy humor in January's "Ride Along 2." That month will also see the release of the animated sequel "The Nut Job 2." Hide Caption 4 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film After a bit of maneuvering, the sequel to 2013's "Man of Steel," "Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice," has found a home on the movie release calendar in March 2016. Hide Caption 5 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film The last time we saw Eddie Murphy as Detective Axel Foley, it was in 1994's "Beverly Hills Cop III." But the passage of time is nothing to a movie studio eager to bet on a proven franchise; "Beverly Hills Cop 4," again starring Murphy as Foley, is slated for March 2016. Hide Caption 6 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film Johnny Depp returns as the Mad Hatter in the long-awaited followup to 2010's "Alice in Wonderland." This 2016 release is called "Alice in Wonderland: Through the Looking Glass." Hide Caption 7 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film The "X-Men" franchise has been thoroughly revived with the arrival of 2011's "X-Men: First Class" and 2014's "X-Men: Days of Future Past." Now we can look forward to "X-Men: Apocalypse," which is currently scheduled for May 2016, along with another "Captain America" installment, "Captain America: Civil War." Hide Caption 8 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film When it comes to sequels, few have been as longed for as "Finding Dory," the next installment following Disney/Pixar's heartwarming 2003 film, "Finding Nemo." This will arrive in theaters along with "Now You See Me 2." Hide Caption 9 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film So Michael Bay's 2014 take on "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles" suffered some criticism; it still did well enough at the box office to make a sequel an obvious choice. Reporter April and her four turtle friends will return to theaters on June 3, 2016. Hide Caption 10 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film Director Roland Emmerich tweeted that Vivica A. Fox will reprise her role as Jasmine Dubrow in "Independence Day 2," the sequel to the hit 1996 film. Also starring Liam Hemsworth and original cast member Jeff Goldblum, the film is slated to open on June 24, 2016. Hide Caption 11 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film "Rise of the Planet of the Apes" was a pleasant surprise in 2011, and 2014's sequel, "Dawn of the Planet of the Apes," was considered one of the best releases of the summer. All of that means the still untitled third installment, due in July 2016, has a lot to live up to. Also arriving that month will be another "Bourne" installment, as well as "Ice Age 5." Hide Caption 12 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film What's a holiday season without at least one kids' movie franchise? In December 2016, that go-to will be "Alvin and the Chipmunks 4." Also arriving this month will be another "Star Wars" installment, "Rogue One." Hide Caption 13 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film It's been awhile, but James Cameron is making a return to Pandora in December 2016 with "Avatar 2." This installment will be followed by two others: "Avatar 3" in 2017 and "Avatar 4" in 2018. Hide Caption 14 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film Guillermo del Toro's visually resplendent "Pacific Rim" is getting a followup in April 2017. The script isn't expected to be done until spring 2015, but it's a safe bet you can look forward to more sea monsters. Hide Caption 15 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film Marvel's "Guardians of the Galaxy" was going to be either a complete disaster or a complete hit; lucky for us, it was the latter. Following the August 2014 release's insane run at the box office, Marvel is planning to deliver a second "Guardians" on May 5, 2017. Hide Caption 16 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film It isn't often that another sequel is celebrated, but a fourth installment of "Toy Story"? We're in. It may be coming in 2017. Hide Caption 17 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film More certain -- at least for now -- are the release dates for the third "How to Train Your Dragon" movie: summer 2017. Hide Caption 18 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film At this point, Johnny Depp might want to consider making his eyeliner permanent. The actor is stepping into Captain Jack Sparrow's costume once again for the fifth "Pirates of the Caribbean" film, which is subtitled "Dead Men Tell No Tales." It's scheduled for July 2017. Hide Caption 19 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film Comic-book Thor may now be a woman, but at the movies, Chris Hemsworth is still wielding the hero's hammer. Following "Thor" and "Thor: The Dark World," the third installment, "Thor: Ragnarok," is slated for July 28, 2017. Hide Caption 20 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film A new and improved Godzilla stormed into theaters in May 2014, and in 2018 we'll get a second look at the fearsome monster. As with the 2014 installment, director Gareth Edwards sits at the helm. Hide Caption 21 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film The penguins from Dreamworks' "Madagascar" films have turned into breakout stars. The scheming seabirds had a movie all of their own called "Penguins of Madagascar." In 2018, we'll also get a fourth installment of the "Madagascar" series. Hide Caption 22 of 23 23 photos: Sequel mania: A guide to the next 4 years of film Marvel already has two more "Avengers" movies on the calendar: "Avengers: Infinity War Part I" opens May 2018, followed by "Avengers: Infinity War Part 2" in May 2019. Hide Caption
